com.nnk.springboot.controllers

Class RatingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nnk.springboot.controllers.RatingController

  • @Controller
public class RatingController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for displaying thymeleaf view of Rating management.

      • validate

        @PostMapping(value="/rating/validate")
public java.lang.String validate(@Valid
                                                                         @Valid RatingDto ratingDto,
                                                                         org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Validate the add Rating form. If form contains errors, show the form view to display fields validation errors. Else, call the service layer to persist Rating and return the Rating list view.
        Parameters:
        ratingDto - of the form
        result - hold validation errors
        Returns:
        View

                                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                          throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Show a view with update Rating form prefilled with Rating current values.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Rating to update
        model - of the view
        Returns:
        View
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the requested Rating not found

      • updateRating

        @PostMapping(value="/rating/update/{id}")
public java.lang.String updateRating(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                java.lang.Integer id,
                                                                                @Valid
                                                                                @Valid RatingDto ratingDto,
                                                                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
                                                                         throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Validate the update Rating form. If form contains errors, show the form view to display fields validation errors. Else, call the service layer to persist Rating and return to Rating list view.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Rating to update
        ratingDto - of the form
        result - hold validation errors
        Returns:
        View
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the requested Rating not found
